mapper.select: SELECT a.semi_lot semi_lot, a.prod_code prod_code, b.prod_name prod_name, a.semi_out_amt semi_out_amt, a.prcs_list_code prcs_list_code, c.emp_name emp_name, a.semi_out_date semi_out_date, a.semi_exd semi_exd FROM semi_out a JOIN com_prod b ON(a.prod_code = b.prod_code) JOIN com_emp c ON(a.emp_code = c.emp_code) ORDER BY a.semi_outd DESC

SELECT a.semi_lot semi_lot, a.prod_code prod_code, b.prod_name prod_name, a.semi_out_amt semi_out_amt, a.prcs_list_code prcs_list_code, c.emp_name emp_name, a.semi_out_date semi_out_date, a.semi_exd semi_exd FROM semi_out a JOIN com_prod b ON(a.prod_code = b.prod_code) JOIN com_emp c ON(a.emp_code = c.emp_code)
AND a.prod_code LIKE '%' || #{productCode} || '%'
AND a.semi_outd >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND a.semi_outd <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY a.semi_outd DESC
